short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Google Drive™ shareable links to direct download links. Google Drive™ is a trademark of Google Inc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small handy tool to quickly convert your Google Drive™ shareable links to direct download links. Does not require an access to you Google Drive™. Simply paste your shareable link here to get a direct download link.

Google Drive™ is a trademark of Google Inc.
